entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as shouting and trying to stop the others from attacking. He is described as saying 'WAIT UNTIL WE'VE GOT THE PROPHECY!'.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as shouting incoherently and accusing someone of being a half-blood. She is described as shrieking 'He dared — he dares —'

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as trying to convey an idea to the others and playing for time by asking about the prophecy.

entities.name: the old bearded man
entities.description: The old bearded man is mentioned as saying 'at the Solstice will come a new . . .'

entities.name: the young woman
entities.description: The young woman is mentioned as saying '. . . and none will come after . . .'

entities.name: prophecy
entities.description: The prophecy is mentioned as something that needs to be handed over by Harry Potter.
